extendedInfo.description: Plunder melds and run with this jewel of a Rummy game. Discover the excitement of Rummy 500, also known as 500 Rum, an expanded version of the classic Rummy card game. Multi-card pickup, layoffs, and multiple meld types keep this game interesting! Treat yourself to a much-deserved card game break. Soothing jewel tones, helpful hints and interesting characters will leave you feeling positive and refreshed. You set the pace, choose your challenge level, and your favorite variation. Created by card game masters, our highest level bots will give even the best Rummy players a challenge! You are in control. Sneak a few hands of Rummy throughout your day, or sit down and enjoy a full game.âââââ Fun for all levels"Fun characters teach all levels.  Experts will really appreciate the challenge!"A step-up from a lonely game of Solitaire, Championship Rummy delivers a game with personality:â Discover 9 amusing computer opponents to both challenge and entertain youâ Enjoy a sense of accomplishment as you (re)master Rummy card playâ Sharpen your skills with Questie, our adorable in-game DreamCoachâ¢ dragonâ Improve your game as you learn not just what to play, but WHYâ Explore in-game options that allow you to cheat in numerous ways and play exciting variationsEnjoy unlimited free Rummy games with this interactive version. Playing cards is simple and an intuitive menu system will let you explore a variety of game options. Easy enough for your inner child and engaging enough for your adult side. You'll enjoy unlocking options that keep you engaged once you've mastered the free version.This FREE version of Championship Rummy includes the following:â Unlimited Gamesâ Colorful HD Graphicsâ Engaging DreamCoachâ¢â Educational Rummy Tutorialâ Friendly Beginner AIâ 3 Entertaining Charactersâ Realistic Sounds and Player TauntsUniversal app features HD graphics for hi-res Android tablet devices and newer Android phones running Honeycomb or Ice Cream Sandwich (3.x) as well as support for older Android phones running Froyo 2.2 or Gingerbread 2.3.For even more challenge, you can optionally purchase these add-ons:1) No Ads   â Disable third-party banner ads   â Disable in-house and addon banner ads   â Support the developer    â Have more space to play!2) Expert Bots   â Play Against New Amusing Characters:     - the vivacious Amber     - the brainy Nicole     - the flirty Wes   â Smarter layoff and multi-pickup strategies3) Practice   â Undo   â Auto Hint   â Play Suggested   â Rebid Hand   â Replay Hand4) Cheats   â View your Opponentsâ Cards   â Demand a Redeal   â Customize your Hand   â Playout an Entire Game   â Score your Hand Early5) Master Bots   â Play Against Our Toughest Master Characters:     - the crafty and sly Chuckles     - the whimsical and brainy Sparky     - the musical and sharp Starla   â Nationally competitive layoff and meld strategies6) Variations   â 10-card - More cards, more points, more fun!   â Michigan - Allow players to 'go out' without discarding   â Dots - Point scoring offers extra mathematical challenge   â Cutthroat - 3 players all competing for layoffs and melds   â Contiuity - Wraparound King-Ace-2 melds are allowed!   â Block - When stock runs out, hand is immediately scored7) Personalized Avatar   â Select and Save Your Personalized Avatar   â Create New Avatars Directly From Your Built-in-Camera   â Import a Photo in the Albums on Your Device8) Custom Character Creator   â Build New Custom Characters   â Select Opponent Characteristics:     - Beginner, Expert or Master     - Timid, Competative, Agressive     - Forgetful, Sharp, Card-Counter     - Wild, Flexible, Predictable.   â Use Your Own Photos to Represent New Characters   â Save Character Settings.9) Royal Treatment   â No Ads, Experts, Masters,    â Cheats, Variations, Practice,    â Personalized Avatar, Custom Character Creator   â Save 40% over purchasing separately

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Great game but this game Cheats A LOT... It picks up from the board and not drop from the card picked up. Sometimes when you are far ahead on points the CPU starts getting high hands and ends the game very quickly... Great game but this game Cheats A LOT... It pick up from the board and not drop from the card picked up. Sometimes when you are far ahead on points the CPU starts getting high hands and ends the game very quickly...
reviews.author: Kwesi oxley

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Wish u could see how many cards the opponent has. And also it would be great to add more opponents. I\'m not sure if there is already an option to do that but I don\'t have it. Anyway pretty good. 5 stars if u add opponents card count.
reviews.author: Zachary Louden

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great game. Only one on the market with rummy500. 5 stars for update including how many cards opponent has left
reviews.author: Brad Kernats

reviews.comment: I wish the computer would put your cards in suit order instead of numerical. I also wish the computer would put the molds were they can be seen. I will not pay to remove the ads just because you choose to hide the molds behind them. I will get fed up soon and reinstall this game.
reviews.author: Susan Summers

reviews.title: It has potential.
reviews.comment: Cant see the amount of cards in the opponents hand. The game freezes. Doesnt save progress.
reviews.author: Tierra Blouin

reviews.title: Luv n hate
reviews.comment: Luv the game but hate the cheatin..also hate that u gotta buy the add ons..smh
reviews.author: Lynnette Prasad

reviews.title: Paid 4 addon but doesnt work
reviews.comment: I paid for the variations addon to play 10-card rummy but it will still only give you 7 cards.  Everything in this app is an extra cost addon.
reviews.author: Gerald Irlund

reviews.title: Pretty good game.
reviews.comment: Needs an undo function got the previous move.  Needs to show how many cards opponent has.
reviews.author: Andrew Stringer

reviews.title: Great except
reviews.comment: Its an awesome game! Jyst needs to be in HD! other tham that its AWESOME
reviews.author: Ashley Spence

reviews.title: Good game but cheats
reviews.comment: Great game but I agree it cheats a lot. When u are winning won\'t let u pick up from the pile. You can\'t see how many cards the computer has so it goes out on u all the time.
reviews.author: David Shelleman

reviews.title: Fun but needs a couple of tweaks
reviews.comment: Yes it\'s the only 500 Rummy game I could find in the store. So MAD RESPECT for that! My biggest complaint is wishing I could save s current game. That way I could play here and therr when I have a free 10-15 minutes. Otherwise I never really get through a full game to unlock more stages. And even if there was a counter to see thr number of cards opponents had would be nice. Because if they had one or two, that would change my mind on picking up the whole discard pile for a few plays. But awesome!!!!!!
reviews.author: Darren Zuchowski

reviews.title: Text too small!
reviews.comment: I can\'t see most of the words well enough.  Stupid looking font makes it even harder to read.  And why is there no way to turn the sound OFF?
reviews.author: Razr Maxx

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Exasperating when my touch is misunderstood and the wrong play is made. Needs a back or undo button. Otherwise a good game even though its limited to the  beginner mode.
reviews.author: Ruth Snyder

reviews.title: Needs alot of improvement
reviews.comment: Theres are oo many bugs to list. one big one being the games dont save. In the middle of a game if u get a call you have to start a new game
reviews.author: Nicole Meyer

reviews.comment: We shouldn\'t have to buy the add-ons. The game gets boring after a while playing the same way.
reviews.author: Annie Rega

reviews.comment: Always loved this game, its free, doesnt crash or freeze. Just wish it was free to put the computer harder. Although its still a challege how it  is already.
reviews.author: ediberto colon

reviews.title: Eh...
reviews.comment: Cool to kill time.... Players cheat, don\'t throw out card they pick up, game also freezes to where you can\'t pick up or throw out
reviews.author: Tiffani Floyd

reviews.title: AD Blocks cards
reviews.comment: Never download this game. It\'s impossible to win because the ads block your runs. Can\'t tell what cards to hit
reviews.author: Audrey Brown

reviews.title: Bad interface, too expensive
reviews.comment: First of all, the interface sucks.  It is difficult to choose the correct card pick up point out of the discarded pile. If it guesses wrong, you\'re stuck. There is an undo option, but you have to pay for it. Every little option, such as higher levels, different scoring methods, no ads are each considered add-ons.  There are several add-on options ranging from $2-$5 each. If you want to unlock all of them, they offer a package deal for $15.  I\'ve played a lot of card games and can tell you this: not worth it
reviews.author: Aaron Roush
